microsim.gui.space

Interface ILayerMouseListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILayerDrawer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LayerDblGridDrawer, LayerIntGridDrawer, LayerMouseListener, LayerMultiObjectGridDrawer, LayerObjectGridDrawer

    public interface ILayerMouseListener
    An interface used by LayerDrawer to manage the mouse events.

    Title: JAS

    Description: Java Agent-based Simulation library

    Copyright (C) 2002 Michele Sonnessa

    Michele Sonnessa

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean performDblClickActionAt(int atX, int atY)
      Notify a double click event on a specific cell.
      boolean performMouseMovedFromTo(int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY)
      Notify a mouse dragging action.
      boolean performRightClickActionAt(int atX, int atY)
      Notify a right button click event on a specific cell.

    • Method Detail

      • performDblClickActionAt

        boolean performDblClickActionAt(int atX,
                              int atY)
        Notify a double click event on a specific cell.
        Parameters:
        atX - The x coordinate of the clicked cell.
        atY - The y coordinate of the clicked cell.
        Returns:
        True if the layer intercepted the event. False if the notify has been ignored.

      • performRightClickActionAt

        boolean performRightClickActionAt(int atX,
                                int atY)
        Notify a right button click event on a specific cell.
        Parameters:
        atX - The x coordinate of the clicked cell.
        atY - The y coordinate of the clicked cell.
        Returns:
        True if the layer intercepted the event. False if the notify has been ignored.

      • performMouseMovedFromTo

        boolean performMouseMovedFromTo(int fromX,
                              int fromY,
                              int toX,
                              int toY)
        Notify a mouse dragging action.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The x coordinate of the starting cell.
        fromY - The y coordinate of the starting cell.
        toX - The x coordinate of the target cell.
        toY - The y coordinate of the target cell.
        Returns:
        True if the layer intercepted the event. False if the notify has been ignored.
